title: Riot, you can nerf Sejuani as much as you want
body:
But I don't care. She was my first real main, and I will continue to do my best to make her work in my games. I will be a Sej main until the day I die!

Ok it hurts how much nerfs she gets when she doesn't have a big playerbase anyway, but I still stand behind what I said.

replies.body:
Press F to pay respects

F
{{summoner:4}}

{{summoner:14}} 
>:(
Heretic, burn {{item:3751}}
F for fire, D for distance
F is for Flash, D is for Disintegrate
F for flames, D for Disgustingly mandatory summoner spell

F is for Flash, D is for Disgusting freaks who put Flash on D need to be ignited. 
{{summoner:14}} {{champion:63}} {{summoner:14}}
D is for "Dis key is the closest to my index finger and thus the most important reaction-intensive summoner spell should go here aka Flash".
who the fuck uses their index finger for summs lol

F for Feverything else
T for Tflash
Ez
No, F is for friends who do stuff together.
No F is for Fires burning down the down.
I could care less about pro play or ranked, I just want to play the character I want.

> [{quoted}](name=Slythrin Umbreon,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=6tTAyJVM,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-09-11T15:33:24.814+0000)
>
> Press F to pay respects
> 
> F

F as fuck man :/
{{summoner:4}}
F
No one cares? Litteraly what are you trying to prove?
I just wanted to say they can’t stop me from playing the chap I want to play.
Riots intention wasn't to stop you from playing sejuani,but w/e

This wasn’t exactly a statement towards riot, but also to players that keep saying Sej is unplayable. As stated by someone else on this thread. As much I so don’t like it, I’m gunna keep playing her even if she is “unplayable”.
Good on you homie, ignore that R107 chap, hes an edgy boi. Play Sejuani to your hearts content.
I don’t think he said anything edgy, but that’s what I plan to do.
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

It became boring to see pro players taking her every single match , tho they can make a  new system to ban 20 champions the Rioters themselves choose every match , pro players can still have their 10 bans , I explained it in one of my earlier comments , this way we won't have to see many champions getting gutted
A faithful player can make a """useless""" champion work fine, I'd take someone dedicated to their main over someone playing FotM any day.

> [{quoted}](name=OurLestrade,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=6tTAyJVM,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-09-11T15:42:20.926+0000)
>
> A faithful player can make a """useless""" champion work fine, I'd take someone dedicated to their main over someone playing FotM any day.

I've made Nidalee work as my current main lol.
So noble of you, but if someone intentionally hurts you, maybe you should consider that they are not worthy of your contribute...
Riot is not intentionally trying to harm players.
Nerfing a champion for no reason (besides money), and then damaging the players who'd like to play that champ, is intentionally harming. Not physically, of course :D
"Never attribute to malice that which can be adequately explained by incompetence".

That's wise :D
Sadly, I've learnt that bad people and stupid people are even in this world, so you actually never know...
I feel this as a yorick main currently struggling with his recent nerfs due to bronze league...
I love yorick too. He’s actually my main pocket pick for top. I hate that he got nerfed too, even though barely anyone plays him.
I would say that its because he was oppressive low elo, which he was, but thats just because people refused to learn how to play against him. Thats why I'm scared for my main Urgot.

> [{quoted}](name=CHEWYARMS,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=6tTAyJVM,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2018-09-11T19:31:05.956+0000)
>
> I feel this as a yorick main currently struggling with his recent nerfs due to bronze league...

I think I am gonna feel this when I try to play Quinn top. Hopefully I won’t get counter picked with poppy. Poppy will be legit impossible for me to play against as Quinn after her AD growth nerf and the electrocute nerf.

But I am gonna be both happy and sad about Yorick nerfs. Hopefully he won’t be that oppressive when I play against him, but I will be sad that I won’t have that much power over all with ghouls when I play my underworld boi.

> [{quoted}](name=Doge2020,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=6tTAyJVM,comment-id=00070001,timestamp=2018-09-11T23:25:51.268+0000)
>
> I think I am gonna feel this when I try to play Quinn top. Hopefully I won’t get counter picked with poppy. Poppy will be legit impossible for me to play against as Quinn after her AD growth nerf and the electrocute nerf.
> 
> But I am gonna be both happy and sad about Yorick nerfs. Hopefully he won’t be that oppressive when I play against him, but I will be sad that I won’t have that much power over all with ghouls when I play my underworld boi.

You as Quinn will likely be oppressive to him because you have an ability that screws almost every melee champion.
Don't worry, we're still in this.

https://champion.gg/champion/Sejuani/Jungle?

Currently the lowest winrate jungler IN THE ENTIRE GAME by over 1%. This is incredibly bad considering shes a somewhat simple champion with lots of CC and tankiness, meaning she should be relatively succesful. Sejuani needs ALOT of love. She has no sustain, her damage is TERRIBLE, her CC is actually less than most champions. She just doesnt do anything, she might as well not exist. Its embarrassing how useless she is.
Never forget middlesticks {{champion:9}}  {{item:3070}}
If I ever do decide to play fiddlesticks, it would be mid. I get he’s a juggler/glorified support now, but his mid games look more fun to me.
I feel you man. Back when they gutted Veigar's stun because he was seeing play in higher elos (as a support at that) I stuck with him. Stay strong my dude.

haha brave...

 see ya  on the list of former Sejuani mains next week

>  see ya  on the list of former Sejuani mains next week

Savage AF
This was heart breaking material

> [{quoted}](name=Mandalorian 117,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=6tTAyJVM,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-09-11T15:27:29.907+0000)
>
> But I don&#039;t care. She was my first real main, and I will continue to do my best to make her work in my games. I will be a Sej main until the day I die!
> 
> Ok it hurts how much nerfs she gets when she doesn&#039;t have a big playerbase anyway, but I still stand behind what I said.

She get nerfed because of pro play. It sucks I know. One of my most played champs, Yorick was nerfed because of pro play a couple patches ago.
This post was my thoughts when I heard about the big Warwick nerfs.
I can respect that.
{{summoner:6}}
I too, find she is seriously lacking some power these days, but I'll prefer thousands of times more this situation than back then when she was an auto-win pick with huge winrate post-rework
